Currently, UnboundedReadFromBoundedSource will call Create.advance() or advanceImpl() any times depends how runners use UnboundedSource(). And, each time it will do index++. And, it will cause integer index overflow, index will becomes negative, then source.allElementsBytes.get(index) will throw IndexOutOfBoundsException.

I can make them two commits. But given they are very related and small, I think it is better to review them together.
